snippet: Democratic National Convention planners have apologized for a display of what appeared to be Russian warships during a tribute to veterans on the convention's last night.
abstract: Democratic National Convention planners have apologized for a display of what appeared to be Russian warships during a tribute to veterans on the convention's last night.

headline.main: Democrats Apologize for Image of Russian Ships at Convention
headline.print_headline: Soviet Surprise: U.S. Tribute, With Wrong Ships
